name: Kingdom Isles
description:
Kingdom Isles is a strategic resource management / survival game. Expand and grow your kingdom from a small village into a large empire, trade resources with allies and protect your people from enemy attacks! 

Features:
-Classic RTS / city builder-style gameplay
-Randomly generated map
-Save and load your progress
-Multiple difficulties, for both casual and hardcore players
-90+ Minutes of gameplay per run
-Tower Defense-style combat
-Unique electronic hip-hop soundtrack

DISCLAIMER: Currently in beta! There will be bugs. If you find any, or just have an awesome idea for a future update, feel free to comment down below :)

-Build

Kingdom Isles features 15+ unique structures for the player to build!

Build Settlements for your people to live in, build Industries to produce different kinds of resources, and build Forts and Walls to defend your kingdom from incoming attacks!

-Trade

The game has an interesting and strategic trading system, allowing the player to sell excess resources, or even buy exotic items that cannot be produced in the kingdom. Prices and items vary every day, and changes throughout the game. 

-Defend

Your kingdom will get attacked from time to time. Enemy ships will storm the coasts, destroying your land if you don't stop them. Kingdom Isles has multiple military buildings, allowing for strategic defenses and synergies.

-Plan

Kingdom Isles is not supposed to be a stressful experience. The game can be paused at anytime (even during enemy attacks), so you can take all the time you need to plan ahead or to just keep up with what's going on.
